intro: Habracanthus luteynii, commonly known as the yellow habitant, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Cucurbitaceae. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its trailing growth habit and yellowish-green leaves. Its flowers are unisexual, with separate male and female flowers on the same plant. The fruit is a small, fleshy capsule that contains several seeds.
